name: LateRun
description:
LateRun is an endless runner (or infinite runner), 2d, side-view game. Use space to jump over the obstacles and get the highest score.

The game was created using the PureBasic (version 5.71 LTS) language and compiler. You can download the provided executable for Windows (x64). The game should also run on Linux and OS X. Feel free to get a copy of the source code and compile it yourself. Here you can download a free version of PureBasic.

Any donations will be used to buy a full license of PureBasic ;)
